target: i once hiked in yosemite . it was very nice and i even saw mountain goats .
context: <user> 9 hi , how are you ? <system> i am good but pretty sleepy . . . how about you ? <user> 10 long day ? did you work or stay up late last night ? i am great . <system> i have a job in a factory , so it takes a lot out of me . <user> 11 what time do you get off ? i totally can relate . <system> i am off at 4 but i work 4 days a week 10 hours per day . <user> 12 i go to work for only a short period of time , cant imagine that <system> it works out good because i get three days off to sleep .<user> 13 do you like to do anything on your days off ? <system> i am not a very social person , anyway . i do like animals and nature .<user> 14 have you ever been hiking ? my roommate and i tend to try new things . <system> yes and i love it . what is the best place you have hiked ?<user> 15 there is a place around me that i like , not sure of the name though . <system>
